name: Vampire's Curse (DenisARAS)
description:
How to Play

Right Click - splashes blood on the map that kills villagers.

Left Click - Splashes Sludge on the map that slows down villagers.

You click and drag buildings (except the castle) so they do not hinder you.

You can not splash blood on top of your buildings.

Hello everyone! This is my entry for MiniJam #118  . I did not have enough time to make polished and well designed system for a game. Put all ı have under 5 hour and this game came to being. I had a mechanic idea.  I think I implemented it good enough. Sorry for the inconvenience.

I used free assets for music and sound effects. Drawings are my own, created within the jam time.
